Description: 1966 Hofner 459-VTZ Sunburst Beatle Violin Guitar with Hardshell Case - Vintage This is a very rare Hofner 459-VTZ that was a top of the line model in the 60's, most famously used by The Beatles. This guitar appears to be in very good condition for its age. It is completely functional with minor cosmetic wear such as checking lines and slight decoloration on the pearl inlays due to aging. The Hofner 459-VTZ is a very fun and cool looking guitar, total retro vibe! Includes original hardshell case. The 459-VTZ, a counterpart to the legendary Hofner violin bass. Made in West Germany and features hollow body construction and built-in Fuzz and Treble Booster circuits! Specifications:22 Frets1.69 Nut Width3-Way Pickup Selector Volume, Tone, Treble, Fuzz Boost Controls Serial # 39287 Made in Germany Weight 5 lbs 12 oz Item will be professionally packed, shipped and insured to guarantee safe arrival The item pictured is the one you will be receiving.No additional accessories included. **BUY WITH CONFIDENCE****FREE SHIPPING WITHIN THE UNITED STATES** Tone House Studios has new Guitar and Recording Studio gear being added every week!!
